commands.text:
# Only change the IP if you're using a server with multiple network interfaces, otherwise change the port only.
 endpoint_add_tcp "${ip}:${port}"
 endpoint_add_udp "${ip}:${port}"
# These resources will start by default.
ensure mapmanager
ensure chat
ensure spawnmanager
ensure sessionmanager
ensure fivem
ensure hardcap
ensure rconlog
ensure scoreboard
# This allows players to use scripthook-based plugins such as the legacy Lambda Menu.
# Set this to 1 to allow scripthook. Do note that this does _not_ guarantee players won't be able to use external plugins.
 sv_scriptHookAllowed ${allowscripts}
 # Uncomment this and set a password to enable RCON. Make sure to change the password - it should look like rcon_password "YOURPASSWORD" 
 #rcon_password "CHANGEME" 
 # A comma-separated list of tags for your server.
 # For example:
# - sets tags "drifting, cars, racing"
# Or:
# - sets tags "roleplay, military, tanks" sets tags "${tags}"
 # A valid locale identifier for your server's primary language.
 # For example "en-US", "fr-CA", "nl-NL", "de-DE", "en-GB", "pt-BR"
 sets locale "${locale}"
 # Set an optional server info and connecting banner image url.
# Size doesn't matter, any banner sized image will be fine.
#sets banner_detail "https://url.to/image.png"
#sets banner_connecting "https://url.to/image.png"
 # Set your server's hostname
 sv_hostname "${servername}"
  # Nested configs!
#exec server_internal.cfg
 # loading a server icon (96x96 PNG file)
 load_server_icon ${servericon}
 # convars which can be used in scripts
set temp_convar "hey world!"  # Uncomment this line if you do not want your server to be listed in the server browser.
# Do not edit it if you *do* want your server listed.
 #sv_master1 ""
  # Add system admins
#add_ace group.admin command allow # allow all commands
#add_ace group.admin command.quit deny # but don't allow quit
#add_principal identifier.fivem:1 group.admin # add the admin to the group
 # Hide player endpoints in external log output.
sv_endpointprivacy ${endpointprivacy}
 # enable OneSync with default configuration (required for server-side state awareness)
onesync_enabled ${onesync}
# Server player slot limit (must be between 1 and 32, unless using OneSync)
sv_maxclients ${maxclients}
 # Steam Web API key, if you want to use Steam authentication (https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey)
set steam_webApiKey "${steamkey}"
 # License key for your server (https://keymaster.fivem.net)
sv_licenseKey ${licensekey}

ip.desc: What IP to bind the server to

port.desc: What port to bind the server to

gameversion.desc: What game version would you like it to install? (Version List)

licensekey.desc: You need a license key for your server (https://keymaster.fivem.net)

maxclients.desc: How many clients you would like to limit in your server? (32 max)

allowscripts.desc: Should Clients be able to run custom Client-Sides Scripts?

tags.desc: What tags would you like to categorize your server.

locale.desc: A valid locale identifier for your server's primary language.

servername.desc: What would you like to display to the server list

endpointprivacy.desc: This should keep the player's IP Addresses a bit more secure/hidden.

servericon.desc: Where would you like to upload your icon to the server listing. (Locally prefered)

steamkey.desc: Steam Web API key, if you want to use Steam authentication (https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey)

onesync.desc: enable OneSync with default configuration (required for server-side state awareness)
